comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Should be "Matzen" not "Matzene." This statue is in Edgewater Park, Cleveland. www.edgewaterpark.net/Art work at the Edge.htm Herman N. Matzen was a Cleveland School of Art faculty member, Found posted on a forum, but not run down to a source: ARTIST(S) Name: Matzen, Herman N. Birth: 1861 Death: 1938 Role: Sculptor TITLE(S) Richard Wagner Monument DATES Creation: unknown Installation: unknown Dedication: 1911 DESCRIPTION Portrait of Richard Wagner wearing an overcoat and hat. His proper left arm holds gloves and a sheaf of papers.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for adding the whole story! We'll update the description.
